topic.title: SALE! My Music!!!
topic.body:
Each Users Has A Key Encryption, and paid 0.01 btc for listen my music
http://127.0.0.1:43110/18qKMzgsanNsRs6ot14gsBLphDLs4CgoLk

1511892314_1KEYVUe9VwFbDCjZfkAt34SAHpz5D.body:
> [vizy93](#comment_8_1KieR53aUzHPPH7b54QyDN5a8iYdZm4r9o): 0.1 BTC? You realize you're asking for almost $1000, right?

yes, i know, for a unique key you access all content so, 0.1 btc, but i can down the price?

> [naeui7tycw9p35y9](#comment_31_1CaVUegZMXMjmRXtq5q3eZDqdtsoNvgep): can you send me copy of your passport?

What? Passport! You Send Me 0.01 btc you send in zeromail the transaction id after verify i you send the key of your user.

> [damn](#comment_4_1EZ6eBdKY7BJmZM1RQtqkXG4TVc8Vvgwqk): 老子凭啥要听你的“music”？

please type english?

> [kopyjane](#comment_74_17ffrcHNzbFoUe81PyMEagQdv2DGNRLFcE): Do the ZeroNet creators really have ties to Pirate Bay?

This Is No Scam, I'm Maving Trouble To Composing
